title: Dataset Clustering for Improved Offline Policy Learning
abstract: arXiv:2402.09550v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Offline policy learning aims to discover decision-making policies from previously-collected datasets without additional online interactions with the environment. As the training dataset is fixed, its quality becomes a crucial determining factor in the performance of the learned policy. This paper studies a dataset characteristic that we refer to as multi-behavior, indicating that the dataset is collected using multiple policies that exhibit distinct behaviors. In contrast, a uni-behavior dataset would be collected solely using one policy. We observed that policies learned from a uni-behavior dataset typically outperform those learned from multi-behavior datasets, despite the uni-behavior dataset having fewer examples and less diversity. Therefore, we propose a behavior-aware deep clustering approach that partitions multi-behavior datasets into several uni-behavior subsets, thereby benefiting downstream policy learning. translated_title: 提高离线策略学习的数据集聚类
translated_abstract: 离线策略学习旨在从先前收集的数据集中发现决策制定策略，而无需与环境进行额外的在线交互。由于训练数据集是固定的，其质量成为影响学习策略性能的关键因素。本文研究了一种我们称之为多行为的数据集特征，指示数据集是使用展现不同行为的多个策略收集的。相反，一个单一行为的数据集将仅使用一个策略收集。我们观察到，从单一行为数据集学习的策略通常比从多行为数据集学习的策略表现更好，尽管单一行为数据集拥有更少的示例和较低的多样性。因此，我们提出了一种行为感知的深层聚类方法，将多行为数据集划分为若干单一行为子集，从而有助于下游策略学习。
tldr: 本文研究了一种名为多行为的数据集特征，提出了一种行为感知的深层聚类方法，将多行为数据集划分为若干单一行为子集，从而提高了离线策略学习的性能。
en_tdlr: This paper studies a dataset characteristic called multi-behavior and proposes a behavior-aware deep clustering approach to partition multi-behavior datasets into several uni-behavior subsets, improving the performance of offline policy learning.
